author: fwyzard
body:
EDMModuleType: enum and functions to classify edm module types

ProcessCallGraph: helper class to manage the process description and modules call graph

FastTimerService: rewrite to support multiple subprocesses, multiple threads per stream and unscheduled execution    
  - defer module dependencies, path structure and process id to the `ProcessCallGraph` class
  - add stubs for all relevant signals
  - remove plots vs luminosity, and the plugins that were used to book and fill such plots; instead, one should use the `FastTimerServiceClient` providing similar functionality in the harvesting step
  - remove the obsolete `FastTimer` classes
  - remove information for overhead and by "module type", and the details that do not make sense with multiple threads per stream
  - reimplement DQM plots and query methods
title: update FastTimerService for CMSSW 9.1.x
